00026 #ifndef _ART_DTRACKLIB_H

00033 // DTrack remote commands:
00034 #define DTRACKLIB_CMD_CAMERAS_OFF           0x1000
00035 #define DTRACKLIB_CMD_CAMERAS_ON            0x1001
00036 #define DTRACKLIB_CMD_CAMERAS_AND_CALC_ON   0x1003
00037 
00038 #define DTRACKLIB_CMD_SEND_DATA             0x3100
00039 #define DTRACKLIB_CMD_STOP_DATA             0x3200
00040 #define DTRACKLIB_CMD_SEND_N_DATA           0x3300
00041 
00042 // Typedef aliases
00043 typedef DTrack_Hand_Type dtracklib_glove_type;
00044 typedef DTrack_Marker_Type dtracklib_marker_type;
00045 
00046 typedef struct{
00047         unsigned long id;       
00048         float quality;          
00049         float loc[3];           
00050         float ang[3];           
00051         float rot[9];           
00052 } dtracklib_body_type;
00053 
00054 typedef struct{
00055         unsigned long id;       
00056         float quality;          
00057         unsigned long bt;       
00058         float loc[3];           
00059         float ang[3];           
00060         float rot[9];           
00061 } dtracklib_flystick_type;
00062 
00063 typedef struct{
00064         unsigned long id;     
00065         float quality;        
00066         unsigned long bt;     
00067         float loc[3];         
00068         float rot[9];         
00069 } dtracklib_meatool_type;
